attributes.description: An unmistakable eye-catching allure. All about the drive. Features include: Engine power output: 88Kw/153Nm – 1.5 Litre in-line 4 cylinder 16 valve DOHC S-VT Petrol (SKYACTIV-G) with i-stop; LED headlamps with auto on/off function; Headlamp levelling; Front rain-sensing wipers; Smart Advanced Keyless entry; Auto fold mirrors; Anti-lock Braking System (ABS); Electronic Brake-force Distribution (EBD); Emergency Brake Assist (EBA); Dynamic Stability Assist (DBS); 7 Airbags SRS: Front (driver, passenger, knee, side and curtain); Advanced keyless push-button engine start; Head-Up Display (HUD); Electronic Parking Brake (EPB); Auto hold; Hill Launch Assist (HLA); Auto Door Lock; Power windows (front and rear); Height adjustable seat – Driver; Aircon (dual-zone climate control); Frameless auto dimming rear-view mirror; Multifunctional, Leather-wrapped steering wheel with controls; Tilt and telescopic adjustable steering wheel; Cruise Control; Leather-wrapped gear shift knob; Rear centre seat armrest with cupholders; 7-Inch TFT LCD digital meter; Parking sensors – Rear; Radio - CD player/AUX jack/2 USB connectivity ports; 12 Speaker BOSE® sound system with subwoofer; MZD Connect system; 8.8-Inch display; Commander dial; Apple CarPlay™ and Android Auto™; Bluetooth® handsfree system; Internet radio integration (Pandora®, Sticher and AHA); Seat trim - Black / Burgundy Leather; 10-Way power adjustable seat with lumbar support for Driver 18” Alloy wheels (Grey metallic) EURO NCAP 5-STAR
